data.name: Too_Long_Words !!!!
data.description:
some Words are Too Long to be written many times in the same paper or essay . For Example ::

globalization  , localization , internationalization ....

So Our mission here is to abbreviate By creating a function that accept this string and return the abbreviation of it .

But There are Rules :

1- if the Word is longer than  or equall 10 charchters , then return the abbreviation . else return the word itself .

2- the abbreviation is constitute of  the first and the last letter of a word and between them we write the number of letters between the first and the last letters.

3- That number is in decimal system and doesn't contain any leading zeroes.

4- Vector header file and its functions are disabled .

Input : output Examples ::

"globalization" >- "g11n"   .

 "localization" >-  "l10n" .
 
 "internationalization" >- "i18n" .
 
 Please , I beg your pardon , if there are any Question concerning the kata Post it as suggestion or question but not isuue , Thanks in advance .
 
 and if any know how to add random tests Please Leave a comment m Thanks for any Contribution .
 
 Hope You Enjoy the kata .. Keep on Learning .
